name: A Walk (Leon Stansfield)
description:
Find your way to meet your dad and make some friends along the way, all whilst tackling some tough platforming challenges in a retro world!

This is a short platformer I made to learn about pico-8 and how to develop with it. I made the game in 1 week with very little prior experience in the engine.

All feedback and bug reports are appreciated!
